title: HP Pavillion X360  801505-501
message: I got an HP Pavillion X360 motherboard that has one bad component on it.  I am trying to source the component to replace it.  Anyone know where I can get this IC from?

title: HP Pavillion X360  801505-501
message:
here....

[url]http://www.ebay.com/itm/1x-MDV1595S-MDV1595SUR-VI595S-V1595S-MDV1595SURH-DFN3x3-8-IC-Chip-/192001104618?hash=item2cb4285aea:g:KsYAAOSwcUBYFEs8[/url]

or from a donor board...
Here datasheet.....

[url]http://download.siliconexpert.com/pdfs/2014/8/24/1/43/47/950/mgns_/manual/247down.phpfilenamemdv1595s.pdf[/url]

title: HP Pavillion X360  801505-501
message:
That is a high side FET so the buck controller is also fucked. The rail it is connected too will also have had 19V on it and probably has caused major damage.
If you want to go ahead anyway find the "quanta Y0D" schematic.
I think this board is trash.
